name: Advanced Italian
description: (Offered in Italian) This course provides students with advanced language practice. Particular emphasis will be given to improving oral proficiency, including pronunciation. Students will acquire nuances and subtleties of the language that will allow them to express themselves more freely in Italian. By the end of the course, students will be able to engage with more facility in the country of study and with other speakers of the language. [24L, 12P]
